account_is_not_anime_premium: Your account does not have a premium anime membership.
account_is_not_drama_premium: Your account does not have a premium drama membership.
app_description: This application lets you stream the latest Anime TV shows directly to your TV and Wii U GamePad. Videos may include mature content.
already_premium_message: You already have a premium membership!
anime_not_included: Anime is not included in your account. Go to crunchyroll.com to upgrade your account.
are_you_sure_you_want_to_remove_pin: Are you sure you want to remove your stored parental PIN?
api_error_generic: Unable to access online features. Please check your network connection settings and try again.
by_creating_account_you_agree_to_terms: By creating an account, you agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
contact_us_message: Contact support at www.crunchyroll.com/contact and we'll get back to you as soon as we can.
drama_not_included: Drama is not included in your account. Go to crunchyroll.com to upgrade your account.
enter_credit_card_for_verification: Please enter a valid credit card for verification purposes. You will not be billed during your free trial.
forgot_password_info: We've got your back! A link will be sent to your email so you can reset your password.
incorrect_pin_please_answer_secret_quest: Incorrect PIN. If you have forgotten your PIN, please go to Parental Controls and answer the secret question.
help_with_service: For more help with our service, please visit crunchyroll.com/help or email support at support@crunchyroll.com
ineligible_message: Sorry, you are not eligible for a free trial at this time. Do you want to continue signing up for premium?
largest_lineup: Largest lineup of Anime & Drama with new simulcasts added daily after TV broadcast
log_in_with_crunchyroll_account: Log in with your Crunchyroll Premium Account
login_step3: 3. Don't leave this screen, you'll be automatically logged in
logout_message: You are currently logged in as:
logout_title: Are you sure you want to log out?
membership_success_message: Success! You are now a premium subscriber!
no_results_please_try_again_later: No results, please try again later.
no_search_results: No matching results. Please try again.
nothing_in_history: Nothing in your history. Watched shows will appear here.
nothing_in_queue: Nothing in your queue. Add items to view them here.
parental_control_pin_required_for_intern: PIN required for viewing "entertainment excluding games".
parental_control_pin_correct: PIN correct. Press "continue" to launch app.
parental_control_pin_saved: Saved this setting. From now on, you can use this software without entering your PIN.
payment_title: Start your {num}-{span} Free Trial of Premium Access
payment_description: Don't worry, you won't be billed during your free trial. If you want to keep Premium access after the free trial, simply do nothing â€” your membership will automatically renew at {price} per {timespan} (plus tax) until cancelled. You can cancel by logging into your account at crunchyroll.com.
please_enter_parental_control_pin: Please enter your parental control PIN to proceed.
saved_pin_parental_controls_disabled: Saved this setting. From now on, Parental Controls restrictions on "entertainment excluding games" have been removed for this software only.
sent_link_message: An email with instructions on how to reset your password has been sent.
signup_or_login_for_free_trial: Sign up or log in for a 14-day free trial
signup_step2: 2. Sign up for a free trial
signup_step3: 3. Log in on your Wii U
to_keep_your_membership_simply_do_nothin: To keep your membership, simply do nothing.
to_upgrade_your_account_visit_crunchyrol: To upgrade your account, visit crunchyroll.com
trial_success_message: Success! Your free trial has begun and you can now enjoy the benefits of a premium membership!
try_premium_left: Simulcast newest episodes as soon as 1 hour after airing in Japan
try_premium_middle: Watch all shows ad-free in HD on all available devices
try_premium_right: Enjoy our entire library of anime, manga, and drama titles
unable_to_connect_to_crunchyroll: Unable to connect to crunchyroll servers. Please check your internet connection. If problem persists, please go to crunchyroll.com/help for help.
upsell_no_ads_message: Get {timespan} of Free Premium Access Now!
upsell_no_ads_title: Want to Watch Shows Without Ads?
upsell_premium_only_message: Try Premium {timespan} Free to Watch This Episode Now!
upsell_premium_only_title: Sorry, This Episode is for Premium Members Only.
watch_new_videos_1_hour_after_broadcast: Watch new videos 1-hour after TV broadcast.
watch_the_latest: Watch the latest Anime & Drama now
would_you_like_to_remove_restrictions_on: Would you like to remove the restrictions on "entertainment excluding games" for this software only?
you_can_remove_stored_pin_on_settings_pa: You can remove this stored PIN on the settings page in app.
you_must_be_logged_in_to_add_to_your_que: You must be logged in to add a series to your queue.
you_must_have_a_premium_anime_or_drama_a: You must have a premium anime or drama account to use this app.
